section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Byron R. White

turn.speaker: william_h_rehnquist
turn.label: Chief Justice Rehnquist
turn.text: The opinions of the Court in two cases No. 86-787, Hicks against Feiock No.86-2037, Landers versus National Railroad Passenger Corporation will be announced by Justice White.

turn.speaker: byron_r_white
turn.label: Justice Byron R. White
turn.text: For the reasons stated in opinion on file in the Hicks case, 86-787, the judgment of the Court of Appeals of California is vacated and remanded for further proceedings.
Justice O'Connor has filed the dissenting opinion in which the Chief Justice and Justice Scalia have joined.
Justice Kennedy did not participate in the case.
